info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 3:29AM EST until December 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow bands will drift southward into southern Herkimer County this morning. The greatest accumulations will occur north of the Thruway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
